description: Variation of condition 2 (development built in accordance with approved plans) to allow:Ground floor gym within 2-4 Priory Park Road extended to replace the ground floor restaurant Reconfiguration to internal layoutsoff Variation of Conditions reference 22/1628 dated 21 September, 2022, for Variation of condition 2, development built in accordance with approved plans to allow:Installation of Air Source Heat Pumps and Boilers within screened rooftop enclosuresof Variation of Conditions reference 21/3206 dated 22 October, 2021, for Variation of Condition No 2 (development built in accordance to approved plans) to allow:Amendments to the lift landings and levelsRevised locations for the wheelchair standard roomsAdjustments to the levels of the conservatories and associated access to maintain wheelchair accessAdjustments to the general arrangements to accommodate the structural steelworkThe removal of 4No. chimney stacks from the rear, southeast elevations of Nos. 6-8 and Nos.10-12 Priory Park RoadInternal adjustments for the building servicesUpdated Access Management Plan and Accessibility Management PlanVariation of condition 2, reference 21/0623, development built in accordance with approved plans to allow:New conservatory enclosures Alterations to landscaping of Variation of condition 2, reference 20/4224, development built in accordance with approved plans to allow:New basement plant roomsLandscapingGround floor refuse and bicycle storage Link between buildings External design of Full Planning Permission reference 19/1279 dated 24 February, 2020, for Nos. 2-4 Prior Park Road: Change of use from commercial (Class A2) to gym and restaurant (Class D2 & A3) at ground floor level and creation of hotel (Class C1) above; erection of an additional floor at roof level; demolition of existing rear structures and construction of a 2-storey rear extension; provision of a rear service yard to include bike and waste storage facilities, restoration of the front facade and associated landscaping.Nos. 6-12 Prior Park Road: extensions to existing hotel including erection of 14 x front dormer roof extensions; erection of walkways between the buildings at 2nd & 4th floor level, 4 x 4-storey rear extensions, removal of the existing fire escape stairs and entrance steps, erection of 2 x rear conservatory extensions.
